creator: Futureplay
descriptionHtml:
Do you fantasize about creating your very own garden by matching and completing puzzles? Your journey starts here! Match fruits and merge a lavish array of charming and magical objects in this fun merge and match adventure!

In the grounds of a forgotten countryside mansion lies a derelict garden waiting for you to restore it to its former glory. What wonders will you discover?

In Merge Gardens, you’ll solve match 3 puzzles to win fabulous rewards you can use to design and decorate the gardens of your beautiful home. Alongside your trusty sidekick, Gatsby the Hedgehog, you’ll explore, merge, evolve and upgrade a world of enchanting and mystical items as you dream up the most stunning and sought-after country grounds there is.

Combining a puzzle merging game with a classic fruit matching puzzle game, Merge Gardens is a relaxing and addictive new free game that you won’t want to put down.

MERGE GARDENS FEATURES

~ MERGE ~

- Escape to the countryside as you discover and merge hundreds of wonderful items to create a garden unparalleled in grandeur and beauty.
- Design your garden your way and freely drag objects anywhere you like. Match 3 of a kind to evolve them into superior items, and merge 5 to double your rewards!
- Heal cursed land as you restore and design, uncovering hidden worlds of lost and forgotten objects like vintage coin chests, fallen stars, dragons, wild flowers and mystery eggs.
- Open the free reward chest every day, abundant with treasures that will make your manor even more magnificent.
- Challenge your mind by completing quests to earn even more rewards!

~ MATCH ~

- Switch and match delicious apples, pears, lemons and grapes in a tasty puzzle adventure to earn rewards that bring your garden to life
- Solve and beat tricky levels by matching delicious fruits
- Plan your moves wisely by matching 3 or more fruits in a row. Smash your goals and get rewarded with delicious rainbow-coloured cascades!
- Pop and blast blocks for irresistible combos that will leave you wanting more.
- Choose extravagant rewards like mystery hampers and exotic wildlife to improve your garden after each level.

~ COLLECT ~

- Gather and nurture wildlife to help you harvest your plants, trees, crops and flowers and make your garden shimmer and blossom.
- Win and organise a plethora of enchanting objects, matching items like magical reeds, luxurious hampers and even sweet golden honey pots.
- Watch your wildlife grow! Merge rare creatures to live over your estate and take care of your lands whilst you’re away. Upgrade and evolve your birds and bugs to create legends with even more healing power.
- Win gems, coins and wood to buy more items at the shop.
- Hoard and interact with a collection of beautiful or funny eggs and hatch precious mythical creatures.

~ FUN, CHALLENGING PUZZLES ~

- Test your puzzle solving skills to complete over 200 challenging match 3 levels and a camp puzzle full of twists with near unlimited customizations. How many combinations can you make from hundreds of items?
- Get special boosters to explode, remove or change spots and create even greater combos.

~ RESTORE AND DESIGN A FORGOTTEN GARDEN ~

- Start your restoration by working on a small and manageable plot at the gates of your luxurious house. Clear fog to unlock and reveal secrets inside the new areas, with vast expanses of land packed full of brand new discoveries!
- Customize your gardens whichever way you like. Do you prefer quaint to the ornate? Or perhaps your style is more modern than traditional? Choose the decorations to build a fantastic place!

Merge Gardens is now only available in a select few countries. We’re a small team working hard to create something that you’ll enjoy playing for many years to come, and your feedback will help us make that happen.

If you have comments, ideas or suggestions we’d love to receive them at mergegardens@futureplaygames.com

What are you waiting for? Start now your journey and create your dream garden!
descriptionShort: Restore and decorate a beautiful garden by merging items and matching puzzles

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
A huge Merge Gardens update!
- 50 new puzzles!
- New mysterious globes with chance to double merge rewards
- Meet Grandma: make her wishes come true!
- Bigger bombs and match while fruit are falling in puzzles!

New wildlife!
- Long Eared Owl
- Green Darner Dragonfly

Also featuring
- Online cloud save
- Better rewards and more gems from puzzles!
- Stars now have eggs inside!
- Gorgeous visual updates game and garden!
- Tons of performance improvements for a smoother experience

~ MERGE ~

- Design your garden your way and freely drag objects anywhere you like. Match 3 of a kind to evolve them into superior items, and merge 5 to double your rewards!
- Heal cursed land as you restore and design, uncovering hidden worlds of lost and forgotten objects like vintage coin chests, fallen stars, dragons, wild flowers and mystery eggs.

~ MATCH ~

- Solve and beat tricky levels by matching delicious fruits

- Pop and blast blocks for irresistible combos that will leave you wanting more.
- Choose extravagant rewards like mystery hampers and exotic wildlife to improve your garden after each level.

- Test your puzzle solving skills to complete over 200 challenging match 3 levels and a camp puzzle full of twists with near unlimited customizations. How many combinations can you make from hundreds of items?

title: Merge Gardens

creator: Futureplay
descriptionHtml:
Do you fantasize about creating your very own garden by matching and completing puzzles? Your journey starts here! Match fruits and merge a lavish array of charming and magical objects in this fun merge and match adventure!

In the grounds of a forgotten countryside mansion lies a derelict garden waiting for you to restore it to its former glory. What wonders will you discover?

In Merge Gardens, you’ll solve match 3 puzzles to win fabulous rewards you can use to design and decorate the gardens of your beautiful home. Alongside your trusty sidekick, Gatsby the Hedgehog, you’ll explore, merge, evolve and upgrade a world of enchanting and mystical items as you dream up the most stunning and sought-after country grounds there is.

Combining a puzzle merging game with a classic fruit matching puzzle game, Merge Gardens is a relaxing and addictive new free game that you won’t want to put down.

MERGE GARDENS FEATURES

~ MERGE ~

- Escape to the countryside as you discover and merge hundreds of wonderful items to create a garden unparalleled in grandeur and beauty.
- Design your garden your way and freely drag objects anywhere you like. Match 3 of a kind to evolve them into superior items, and merge 5 to double your rewards!
- Heal cursed land as you restore and design, uncovering hidden worlds of lost and forgotten objects like vintage coin chests, fallen stars, dragons, wild flowers and mystery eggs.
- Open the free reward chest every day, abundant with treasures that will make your manor even more magnificent.
- Challenge your mind by completing quests to earn even more rewards!

~ MATCH ~

- Switch and match delicious apples, pears, lemons and grapes in a tasty puzzle adventure to earn rewards that bring your garden to life
- Solve and beat tricky levels by matching delicious fruits
- Plan your moves wisely by matching 3 or more fruits in a row. Smash your goals and get rewarded with delicious rainbow-coloured cascades!
- Pop and blast blocks for irresistible combos that will leave you wanting more.
- Choose extravagant rewards like mystery hampers and exotic wildlife to improve your garden after each level.

~ COLLECT ~

- Gather and nurture wildlife to help you harvest your plants, trees, crops and flowers and make your garden shimmer and blossom.
- Win and organise a plethora of enchanting objects, matching items like magical reeds, luxurious hampers and even sweet golden honey pots.
- Watch your wildlife grow! Merge rare creatures to live over your estate and take care of your lands whilst you’re away. Upgrade and evolve your birds and bugs to create legends with even more healing power.
- Win gems, coins and wood to buy more items at the shop.
- Hoard and interact with a collection of beautiful or funny eggs and hatch precious mythical creatures.

~ FUN, CHALLENGING PUZZLES ~

- Test your puzzle solving skills to complete over 200 challenging match 3 levels and a camp puzzle full of twists with near unlimited customizations. How many combinations can you make from hundreds of items?
- Get special boosters to explode, remove or change spots and create even greater combos.

~ RESTORE AND DESIGN A FORGOTTEN GARDEN ~

- Start your restoration by working on a small and manageable plot at the gates of your luxurious house. Clear fog to unlock and reveal secrets inside the new areas, with vast expanses of land packed full of brand new discoveries!
- Customize your gardens whichever way you like. Do you prefer quaint to the ornate? Or perhaps your style is more modern than traditional? Choose the decorations to build a fantastic place!

We’re a small team working hard to create something that you’ll enjoy playing for many years to come, and your feedback will help us make that happen.

If you have comments, ideas or suggestions we’d love to receive them at mergegardens@futureplaygames.com

What are you waiting for? Start now your journey and create your dream garden!

title: Merge Gardens

creator: Futureplay
descriptionHtml:
Do you fantasize about creating your very own garden by matching and completing puzzles? Your journey starts here! Match fruits and merge a lavish array of charming and magical objects in this fun merge and match adventure!

In the grounds of a forgotten countryside mansion lies a derelict garden waiting for you to restore it to its former glory. What wonders will you discover?

In Merge Gardens, you’ll solve match 3 puzzles to win fabulous rewards you can use to design and decorate the gardens of your beautiful home. Alongside your trusty sidekick, Gatsby the Hedgehog, you’ll explore, merge, evolve and upgrade a world of enchanting and mystical items as you dream up the most stunning and sought-after country grounds there is.

Combining a puzzle merging game with a classic fruit matching puzzle game, Merge Gardens is a relaxing and addictive new free game that you won’t want to put down.

MERGE GARDENS FEATURES

~ MERGE ~

- Escape to the countryside as you discover and merge hundreds of wonderful items to create a garden unparalleled in grandeur and beauty.
- Design your garden your way and freely drag objects anywhere you like. Match 3 of a kind to evolve them into superior items, and merge 5 to double your rewards!
- Heal cursed land as you restore and design, uncovering hidden worlds of lost and forgotten objects like vintage coin chests, fallen stars, dragons, wild flowers and mystery eggs.
- Open the free reward chest every day, abundant with treasures that will make your manor even more magnificent.
- Challenge your mind by completing quests to earn even more rewards!

~ MATCH ~

- Switch and match delicious apples, pears, lemons and grapes in a tasty puzzle adventure to earn rewards that bring your garden to life
- Solve and beat tricky levels by matching delicious fruits
- Plan your moves wisely by matching 3 or more fruits in a row. Smash your goals and get rewarded with delicious rainbow-coloured cascades!
- Pop and blast blocks for irresistible combos that will leave you wanting more.
- Choose extravagant rewards like mystery hampers and exotic wildlife to improve your garden after each level.

~ COLLECT ~

- Gather and nurture wildlife to help you harvest your plants, trees, crops and flowers and make your garden shimmer and blossom.
- Win and organise a plethora of enchanting objects, matching items like magical reeds, luxurious hampers and even sweet golden honey pots.
- Watch your wildlife grow! Merge rare creatures to live over your estate and take care of your lands whilst you’re away. Upgrade and evolve your birds and bugs to create legends with even more healing power.
- Win gems, coins and wood to buy more items at the shop.
- Hoard and interact with a collection of beautiful or funny eggs and hatch precious mythical creatures.

~ FUN, CHALLENGING PUZZLES ~

- Test your puzzle solving skills to complete over 200 challenging match 3 levels and a camp puzzle full of twists with near unlimited customizations. How many combinations can you make from hundreds of items?
- Get special boosters to explode, remove or change spots and create even greater combos.

~ RESTORE AND DESIGN A FORGOTTEN GARDEN ~

- Start your restoration by working on a small and manageable plot at the gates of your luxurious house. Clear fog to unlock and reveal secrets inside the new areas, with vast expanses of land packed full of brand new discoveries!
- Customize your gardens whichever way you like. Do you prefer quaint to the ornate? Or perhaps your style is more modern than traditional? Choose the decorations to build a fantastic place!

We’re a small team working hard to create something that you’ll enjoy playing for many years to come, and your feedback will help us make that happen.

If you have comments, ideas or suggestions we’d love to receive them at mergegardens@futureplaygames.com

What are you waiting for? Start now your journey and create your dream garden!

title: Merge Gardens

creator: Futureplay
descriptionHtml:
Do you fantasize about creating your very own garden by matching and completing puzzles? Your journey starts here! Match fruits and merge a lavish array of charming and magical objects in this fun merge and match adventure!

In the grounds of a forgotten countryside mansion lies a derelict garden waiting for you to restore it to its former glory. What wonders will you discover?

In Merge Gardens, you’ll solve match 3 puzzles to win fabulous rewards you can use to design and decorate the gardens of your beautiful home. Alongside your trusty sidekick, Gatsby the Hedgehog, you’ll explore, merge, evolve and upgrade a world of enchanting and mystical items as you dream up the most stunning and sought-after country grounds there is.

Combining a puzzle merging game with a classic fruit matching puzzle game, Merge Gardens is a relaxing and addictive new free game that you won’t want to put down.

MERGE GARDENS FEATURES

~ MERGE ~

- Escape to the countryside as you discover and merge hundreds of wonderful items to create a garden unparalleled in grandeur and beauty.
- Design your garden your way and freely drag objects anywhere you like. Match 3 of a kind to evolve them into superior items, and merge 5 to double your rewards!
- Heal cursed land as you restore and design, uncovering hidden worlds of lost and forgotten objects like vintage coin chests, fallen stars, dragons, wild flowers and mystery eggs.
- Open the free reward chest every day, abundant with treasures that will make your manor even more magnificent.
- Challenge your mind by completing quests to earn even more rewards!

~ MATCH ~

- Switch and match delicious apples, pears, lemons and grapes in a tasty puzzle adventure to earn rewards that bring your garden to life
- Solve and beat tricky levels by matching delicious fruits
- Plan your moves wisely by matching 3 or more fruits in a row. Smash your goals and get rewarded with delicious rainbow-coloured cascades!
- Pop and blast blocks for irresistible combos that will leave you wanting more.
- Choose extravagant rewards like mystery hampers and exotic wildlife to improve your garden after each level.

~ COLLECT ~

- Gather and nurture wildlife to help you harvest your plants, trees, crops and flowers and make your garden shimmer and blossom.
- Win and organise a plethora of enchanting objects, matching items like magical reeds, luxurious hampers and even sweet golden honey pots.
- Watch your wildlife grow! Merge rare creatures to live over your estate and take care of your lands whilst you’re away. Upgrade and evolve your birds and bugs to create legends with even more healing power.
- Win gems, coins and wood to buy more items at the shop.
- Hoard and interact with a collection of beautiful or funny eggs and hatch precious mythical creatures.

~ FUN, CHALLENGING PUZZLES ~

- Test your puzzle solving skills to complete over 200 challenging match 3 levels and a camp puzzle full of twists with near unlimited customizations. How many combinations can you make from hundreds of items?
- Get special boosters to explode, remove or change spots and create even greater combos.

~ RESTORE AND DESIGN A FORGOTTEN GARDEN ~

- Start your restoration by working on a small and manageable plot at the gates of your luxurious house. Clear fog to unlock and reveal secrets inside the new areas, with vast expanses of land packed full of brand new discoveries!
- Customize your gardens whichever way you like. Do you prefer quaint to the ornate? Or perhaps your style is more modern than traditional? Choose the decorations to build a fantastic place!

We’re a small team working hard to create something that you’ll enjoy playing for many years to come, and your feedback will help us make that happen.

If you have comments, ideas or suggestions we’d love to receive them at mergegardens@futureplaygames.com

What are you waiting for? Start now your journey and create your dream garden!

New wildlife!

Events!

- Design your garden your way and freely drag objects anywhere you like. Match 3 of a kind to evolve them into superior items, and merge 5 to double your rewards!
- Heal cursed land as you restore and design, uncovering hidden worlds of lost and forgotten objects like vintage coin chests, fallen stars, dragons, wild flowers and mystery eggs.
- Open the free reward chest every day, abundant with treasures that will make your manor even more magnificent.
- Challenge your mind by completing quests to earn even more rewards!

~ MATCH ~

- Switch and match delicious apples, pears, lemons and grapes in a tasty puzzle adventure to earn rewards that bring your garden to life
- Solve and beat tricky levels by matching delicious fruits
- Plan your moves wisely by matching 3 or more fruits in a row. Smash your goals and get rewarded with delicious rainbow-coloured cascades!
- Pop and blast blocks for irresistible combos that will leave you wanting more.
- Choose extravagant rewards like mystery hampers and exotic wildlife to improve your garden after each level.

~ COLLECT ~

- Gather and nurture wildlife to help you harvest your plants, trees, crops and flowers and make your garden shimmer and blossom.
- Win and organise a plethora of enchanting objects, matching items like magical reeds, luxurious hampers and even sweet golden honey pots.
- Watch your wildlife grow! Merge rare creatures to live over your estate and take care of your lands whilst you’re away. Upgrade and evolve your birds and bugs to create legends with even more healing power.
- Win gems, coins and wood to buy more items at the shop.
- Hoard and interact with a collection of beautiful or funny eggs and hatch precious mythical creatures.

~ FUN, CHALLENGING PUZZLES ~

- Test your puzzle solving skills to complete over 700 challenging match 3 levels and a camp puzzle full of twists with near unlimited customizations. How many combinations can you make from hundreds of items?
- Get special boosters to explode, remove or change spots and create even greater combos.

~ RESTORE AND DESIGN A FORGOTTEN GARDEN ~

- Start your restoration by working on a small and manageable plot at the gates of your luxurious house. Clear fog to unlock and reveal secrets inside the new areas, with vast expanses of land packed full of brand new discoveries!
- Customize your gardens whichever way you like. Do you prefer quaint to the ornate? Or perhaps your style is more modern than traditional? Choose the decorations to build a fantastic place!

We’re a small team working hard to create something that you’ll enjoy playing for many years to come, and your feedback will help us make that happen.

If you have comments, ideas or suggestions we’d love to receive them at mergegardens@futureplaygames.com

What are you waiting for? Start now your journey and create your dream garden!

title: Merge Gardens

creator: Futureplay
descriptionHtml:
Do you fantasize about creating your very own garden by matching and completing puzzles? Your journey starts here! Match fruits and merge a lavish array of charming and magical objects in this fun merge and match adventure!

In the grounds of a forgotten countryside mansion lies a derelict garden waiting for you to restore it to its former glory. What wonders will you discover?

In Merge Gardens, you’ll solve match 3 puzzles to win fabulous rewards you can use to design and decorate the gardens of your beautiful home. Alongside your trusty sidekick, Gatsby the Hedgehog, you’ll explore, merge, evolve and upgrade a world of enchanting and mystical items as you dream up the most stunning and sought-after country grounds there is.

Combining a puzzle merging game with a classic fruit matching puzzle game, Merge Gardens is a relaxing and addictive new free game that you won’t want to put down.

MERGE GARDENS FEATURES

~ MERGE ~

- Escape to the countryside as you discover and merge hundreds of wonderful items to create a garden unparalleled in grandeur and beauty.
- Design your garden your way and freely drag objects anywhere you like. Match 3 of a kind to evolve them into superior items, and merge 5 to double your rewards!
- Heal cursed land as you restore and design, uncovering hidden worlds of lost and forgotten objects like vintage coin chests, fallen stars, dragons, wild flowers and mystery eggs.
- Open the free reward chest every day, abundant with treasures that will make your manor even more magnificent.
- Challenge your mind by completing quests to earn even more rewards!

~ MATCH ~

- Switch and match delicious apples, pears, lemons and grapes in a tasty puzzle adventure to earn rewards that bring your garden to life
- Solve and beat tricky levels by matching delicious fruits
- Plan your moves wisely by matching 3 or more fruits in a row. Smash your goals and get rewarded with delicious rainbow-coloured cascades!
- Pop and blast blocks for irresistible combos that will leave you wanting more.
- Choose extravagant rewards like mystery hampers and exotic wildlife to improve your garden after each level.

~ COLLECT ~

- Gather and nurture wildlife to help you harvest your plants, trees, crops and flowers and make your garden shimmer and blossom.
- Win and organise a plethora of enchanting objects, matching items like magical reeds, luxurious hampers and even sweet golden honey pots.
- Watch your wildlife grow! Merge rare creatures to live over your estate and take care of your lands whilst you’re away. Upgrade and evolve your birds and bugs to create legends with even more healing power.
- Win gems, coins and wood to buy more items at the shop.
- Hoard and interact with a collection of beautiful or funny eggs and hatch precious mythical creatures.

~ FUN, CHALLENGING PUZZLES ~

- Test your puzzle solving skills to complete hundreds of challenging match three levels and a camp puzzle full of twists with near unlimited customizations. How many combinations can you make from hundreds of items?
- Get special boosters to explode, remove or change spots and create even greater combos.

~ RESTORE AND DESIGN A FORGOTTEN GARDEN ~

- Start your restoration by working on a small and manageable plot at the gates of your luxurious house. Clear fog to unlock and reveal secrets inside the new areas, with vast expanses of land packed full of brand new discoveries!
- Customize your gardens whichever way you like. Do you prefer quaint to the ornate? Or perhaps your style is more modern than traditional? Choose the decorations to build a fantastic place!

We’re a small team working hard to create something that you’ll enjoy playing for many years to come, and your feedback will help us make that happen.

If you have comments, ideas or suggestions we’d love to receive them at mergegardens@futureplaygames.com

What are you waiting for? Start now your journey and create your dream garden!

In Merge Gardens, you’ll solve match 3 puzzles to win fabulous rewards you can use to design and decorate the gardens of your beautiful home. Alongside your trusty sidekick, Gatsby the Hedgehog, you’ll explore, merge, evolve and upgrade a world of enchanting and mystical items as you dream up the most stunning and sought-after country grounds there is.

Combining a puzzle merging game with a classic fruit matching puzzle game, Merge Gardens is a relaxing and addictive new free game that you won’t want to put down.

MERGE GARDENS FEATURES

~ MERGE ~

- Escape to the countryside as you discover and merge hundreds of wonderful items to create a garden unparalleled in grandeur and beauty.
- Design your garden your way and freely drag objects anywhere you like. Match 3 of a kind to evolve them into superior items, and merge 5 to double your rewards!
- Heal cursed land as you restore and design, uncovering hidden worlds of lost and forgotten objects like vintage coin chests, fallen stars, dragons, wild flowers and mystery eggs.
- Open the free reward chest every day, abundant with treasures that will make your manor even more magnificent.
- Challenge your mind by completing quests to earn even more rewards!

~ MATCH ~

- Switch and match delicious apples, pears, lemons and grapes in a tasty puzzle adventure to earn rewards that bring your garden to life
- Solve and beat tricky levels by matching delicious fruits
- Plan your moves wisely by matching 3 or more fruits in a row. Smash your goals and get rewarded with delicious rainbow-coloured cascades!
- Pop and blast blocks for irresistible combos that will leave you wanting more.
- Choose extravagant rewards like mystery hampers and exotic wildlife to improve your garden after each level.

~ COLLECT ~

- Gather and nurture wildlife to help you harvest your plants, trees, crops and flowers and make your garden shimmer and blossom.
- Win and organise a plethora of enchanting objects, matching items like magical reeds, luxurious hampers and even sweet golden honey pots.
- Watch your wildlife grow! Merge rare creatures to live over your estate and take care of your lands whilst you’re away. Upgrade and evolve your birds and bugs to create legends with even more healing power.
- Win gems, coins and wood to buy more items at the shop.
- Hoard and interact with a collection of beautiful or funny eggs and hatch precious mythical creatures.

~ FUN, CHALLENGING PUZZLES ~

- Test your puzzle solving skills to complete hundreds of challenging match three levels and a camp puzzle full of twists with near unlimited customizations. How many combinations can you make from hundreds of items?
- Get special boosters to explode, remove or change spots and create even greater combos.

~ RESTORE AND DESIGN A FORGOTTEN GARDEN ~

- Start your restoration by working on a small and manageable plot at the gates of your luxurious house. Clear fog to unlock and reveal secrets inside the new areas, with vast expanses of land packed full of brand new discoveries!
- Customize your gardens whichever way you like. Do you prefer quaint to the ornate? Or perhaps your style is more modern than traditional? Choose the decorations to build a fantastic place!

We’re a small team working hard to create something that you’ll enjoy playing for many years to come, and your feedback will help us make that happen.

If you have comments, ideas or suggestions we’d love to receive them at mergegardens@futureplaygames.com

What are you waiting for? Start now your journey and create your dream garden!

- Switch and match delicious apples, pears, lemons and grapes in a tasty puzzle adventure to earn rewards that bring your garden to life

~ COLLECT ~

- Gather and nurture wildlife to help you harvest your plants, trees, crops and flowers and make your garden shimmer and blossom.

- Watch your wildlife grow! Merge rare creatures to live over your estate and take care of your lands whilst you’re away. Upgrade and evolve your birds and bugs to create legends with even more healing power.
- Win gems, coins and wood to buy more items at the shop.
- Hoard and interact with a collection of beautiful or funny eggs and hatch precious mythical creatures.

- Test your puzzle solving skills to complete hundreds of challenging match three levels and a camp puzzle full of twists with near unlimited customizations. How many combinations can you make from hundreds of items?

MERGE GARDENS FEATURES

~ MERGE ~

- Design your garden your way and freely drag objects anywhere you like. Match 3 of a kind to evolve them into superior items, and merge 5 to double your rewards!
- Heal cursed land as you restore and design, uncovering hidden worlds of lost and forgotten objects like vintage coin chests, fallen stars, dragons, wild flowers and mystery eggs.

~ MATCH ~

- Switch and match delicious apples, pears, lemons and grapes in a tasty puzzle adventure to earn rewards that bring your garden to life
- Solve and beat tricky levels by matching delicious fruits
- Plan your moves wisely by matching 3 or more fruits in a row. Smash your goals and get rewarded with delicious rainbow-coloured cascades!
- Pop and blast blocks for irresistible combos that will leave you wanting more.
- Choose extravagant rewards like mystery hampers and exotic wildlife to improve your garden after each level.

Alongside your trusty sidekick, Gatsby the Hedgehog, you’ll explore, merge, evolve and upgrade a world of enchanting and mystical items as you dream up the most stunning and sought-after country grounds there is.

Combining a puzzle merging game with a classic fruit matching puzzle game, Merge Gardens is a relaxing and addictive new free game that you won’t want to put down.

MERGE GARDENS FEATURES

~ MERGE ~

- Escape to the countryside as you discover and merge hundreds of wonderful items to create a garden unparalleled in grandeur and beauty.
- Design your garden your way and freely drag objects anywhere you like. Match 3 of a kind to evolve them into superior items, and merge 5 to double your rewards!
- Heal cursed land as you restore and design, uncovering hidden worlds of lost and forgotten objects like vintage coin chests, fallen stars, dragons, wild flowers and mystery eggs.
- Open the free reward chest every day, abundant with treasures that will make your manor even more magnificent.
- Challenge your mind by completing quests to earn even more rewards!

~ MATCH ~

- Switch and match delicious apples, pears, lemons and grapes in a tasty puzzle adventure to earn rewards that bring your garden to life
- Solve and beat tricky levels by matching delicious fruits
- Plan your moves wisely by matching 3 or more fruits in a row. Smash your goals and get rewarded with delicious rainbow-coloured cascades!
- Pop and blast blocks for irresistible combos that will leave you wanting more.
- Choose extravagant rewards like mystery hampers and exotic wildlife to improve your garden after each level.

~ COLLECT ~

- Gather and nurture wildlife to help you harvest your plants, trees, crops and flowers and make your garden shimmer and blossom.
- Win and organise a plethora of enchanting objects, matching items like magical reeds, luxurious hampers and even sweet golden honey pots.
- Watch your wildlife grow! Merge rare creatures to live over your estate and take care of your lands whilst you’re away. Upgrade and evolve your birds and bugs to create legends with even more healing power.
- Win gems, coins and wood to buy more items at the shop.
- Hoard and interact with a collection of beautiful or funny eggs and hatch precious mythical creatures.

~ FUN, CHALLENGING PUZZLES ~

- Test your puzzle solving skills to complete hundreds of challenging match three levels and a camp puzzle full of twists with near unlimited customizations. How many combinations can you make from hundreds of items?
- Get special boosters to explode, remove or change spots and create even greater combos.

~ RESTORE AND DESIGN A FORGOTTEN GARDEN ~

- Start your restoration by working on a small and manageable plot at the gates of your luxurious house. Clear fog to unlock and reveal secrets inside the new areas, with vast expanses of land packed full of brand new discoveries!
- Customize your gardens whichever way you like. Do you prefer quaint to the ornate? Or perhaps your style is more modern than traditional? Choose the decorations to build a fantastic place!

We’re a small team working hard to create something that you’ll enjoy playing for many years to come, and your feedback will help us make that happen.

If you have comments, ideas or suggestions we’d love to receive them at mergegardens@futureplaygames.com

What are you waiting for? Start now your journey and create your dream garden!

~ COLLECT ~

- Gather and nurture wildlife to help you harvest your plants, trees, crops and flowers and make your garden shimmer and blossom.

- Test your puzzle solving skills to complete hundreds of challenging match three levels and a camp puzzle full of twists with near unlimited customizations. How many combinations can you make from hundreds of items?

In Merge Gardens, you’ll solve match 3 puzzles to win fabulous rewards you can use to design and decorate the gardens of your beautiful home. Alongside your trusty sidekick, Gatsby the Hedgehog, you’ll explore, merge, evolve and upgrade a world of enchanting and mystical items as you dream up the most stunning and sought-after country grounds there is.

Combining a puzzle merging game with a classic fruit matching puzzle game, Merge Gardens is a relaxing and addictive new free game that you won’t want to put down.

MERGE GARDENS FEATURES

~ MERGE ~

- Escape to the countryside as you discover and merge hundreds of wonderful items to create a garden unparalleled in grandeur and beauty.
- Design your garden your way and freely drag objects anywhere you like. Match 3 of a kind to evolve them into superior items, and merge 5 to double your rewards!
- Heal cursed land as you restore and design, uncovering hidden worlds of lost and forgotten objects like vintage coin chests, fallen stars, dragons, wild flowers and mystery eggs.
- Open the free reward chest every day, abundant with treasures that will make your manor even more magnificent.
- Challenge your mind by completing quests to earn even more rewards!

~ MATCH ~

- Switch and match delicious apples, pears, lemons and grapes in a tasty puzzle adventure to earn rewards that bring your garden to life
- Solve and beat tricky levels by matching delicious fruits
- Plan your moves wisely by matching 3 or more fruits in a row. Smash your goals and get rewarded with delicious rainbow-coloured cascades!
- Pop and blast blocks for irresistible combos that will leave you wanting more.
- Choose extravagant rewards like mystery hampers and exotic wildlife to improve your garden after each level.

~ COLLECT ~

- Gather and nurture wildlife to help you harvest your plants, trees, crops and flowers and make your garden shimmer and blossom.
- Win and organise a plethora of enchanting objects, matching items like magical reeds, luxurious hampers and even sweet golden honey pots.
- Watch your wildlife grow! Merge rare creatures to live over your estate and take care of your lands whilst you’re away. Upgrade and evolve your birds and bugs to create legends with even more healing power.
- Win gems, coins and wood to buy more items at the shop.
- Hoard and interact with a collection of beautiful or funny eggs and hatch precious mythical creatures.

title: Merge Gardens

creator: Futureplay
descriptionHtml:
Do you fantasize about creating your very own garden by matching and completing puzzles? Your journey starts here! Match fruits and merge a lavish array of charming and magical objects in this fun merge and match adventure!

In the grounds of a forgotten countryside mansion lies a derelict garden waiting for you to restore it to its former glory. What wonders will you discover?

In Merge Gardens, you’ll solve match 3 puzzles to win fabulous rewards you can use to design and decorate the gardens of your beautiful home. Alongside your trusty sidekick, Gatsby the Hedgehog, you’ll explore, merge, evolve and upgrade a world of enchanting and mystical items as you dream up the most stunning and sought-after country grounds there is.

Combining a puzzle merging game with a classic fruit matching puzzle game, Merge Gardens is a relaxing and addictive new free game that you won’t want to put down.

MERGE GARDENS FEATURES

~ MERGE ~

- Escape to the countryside as you discover and merge hundreds of wonderful items to create a garden unparalleled in grandeur and beauty.
- Design your garden your way and freely drag objects anywhere you like. Match 3 of a kind to evolve them into superior items, and merge 5 to double your rewards!
- Heal cursed land as you restore and design, uncovering hidden worlds of lost and forgotten objects like vintage coin chests, fallen stars, dragons, wild flowers and mystery eggs.
- Open the free reward chest every day, abundant with treasures that will make your manor even more magnificent.
- Challenge your mind by completing quests to earn even more rewards!

~ MATCH ~

- Switch and match delicious apples, pears, lemons and grapes in a tasty puzzle adventure to earn rewards that bring your garden to life
- Solve and beat tricky levels by matching delicious fruits
- Plan your moves wisely by matching 3 or more fruits in a row. Smash your goals and get rewarded with delicious rainbow-coloured cascades!
- Pop and blast blocks for irresistible combos that will leave you wanting more.
- Choose extravagant rewards like mystery hampers and exotic wildlife to improve your garden after each level.

~ COLLECT ~

- Gather and nurture wildlife to help you harvest your plants, trees, crops and flowers and make your garden shimmer and blossom.
- Win and organise a plethora of enchanting objects, matching items like magical reeds, luxurious hampers and even sweet golden honey pots.
- Watch your wildlife grow! Merge rare creatures to live over your estate and take care of your lands whilst you’re away. Upgrade and evolve your birds and bugs to create legends with even more healing power.
- Win gems, coins and wood to buy more items at the shop.
- Hoard and interact with a collection of beautiful or funny eggs and hatch precious mythical creatures.

~ FUN, CHALLENGING PUZZLES ~

- Test your puzzle solving skills to complete hundreds of challenging match three levels and a camp puzzle full of twists with near unlimited customizations. How many combinations can you make from hundreds of items?
- Get special boosters to explode, remove or change spots and create even greater combos.

~ RESTORE AND DESIGN A FORGOTTEN GARDEN ~

- Start your restoration by working on a small and manageable plot at the gates of your luxurious house. Clear fog to unlock and reveal secrets inside the new areas, with vast expanses of land packed full of brand new discoveries!
- Customize your gardens whichever way you like. Do you prefer quaint to the ornate? Or perhaps your style is more modern than traditional? Choose the decorations to build a fantastic place!

We’re a small team working hard to create something that you’ll enjoy playing for many years to come, and your feedback will help us make that happen.

If you have comments, ideas or suggestions we’d love to receive them at mergegardens@futureplaygames.com

What are you waiting for? Start now your journey and create your dream garden!

- Heal cursed land as you restore and design, uncovering hidden worlds of lost and forgotten objects like vintage coin chests, fallen stars, dragons, wild flowers and mystery eggs.
- Open the free reward chest every day, abundant with treasures that will make your manor even more magnificent.
- Challenge your mind by completing quests to earn even more rewards!

~ MATCH ~

- Switch and match delicious apples, pears, lemons and grapes in a tasty puzzle adventure to earn rewards that bring your garden to life
- Solve and beat tricky levels by matching delicious fruits
- Plan your moves wisely by matching 3 or more fruits in a row. Smash your goals and get rewarded with delicious rainbow-coloured cascades!
- Pop and blast blocks for irresistible combos that will leave you wanting more.
- Choose extravagant rewards like mystery hampers and exotic wildlife to improve your garden after each level.

~ COLLECT ~

- Gather and nurture wildlife to help you harvest your plants, trees, crops and flowers and make your garden shimmer and blossom.
- Win and organise a plethora of enchanting objects, matching items like magical reeds, luxurious hampers and even sweet golden honey pots.
- Watch your wildlife grow! Merge rare creatures to live over your estate and take care of your lands whilst you’re away. Upgrade and evolve your birds and bugs to create legends with even more healing power.
- Win gems, coins and wood to buy more items at the shop.
- Hoard and interact with a collection of beautiful or funny eggs and hatch precious mythical creatures.

~ FUN, CHALLENGING PUZZLES ~

- Test your puzzle solving skills to complete hundreds of challenging match three levels and a camp puzzle full of twists with near unlimited customizations. How many combinations can you make from hundreds of items?
- Get special boosters to explode, remove or change spots and create even greater combos.

~ RESTORE AND DESIGN A FORGOTTEN GARDEN ~

- Start your restoration by working on a small and manageable plot at the gates of your luxurious house. Clear fog to unlock and reveal secrets inside the new areas, with vast expanses of land packed full of brand new discoveries!
- Customize your gardens whichever way you like. Do you prefer quaint to the ornate? Or perhaps your style is more modern than traditional? Choose the decorations to build a fantastic place!

We’re a small team working hard to create something that you’ll enjoy playing for many years to come, and your feedback will help us make that happen.

If you have comments, ideas or suggestions we’d love to receive them at mergegardens@futureplaygames.com

What are you waiting for? Start now your journey and create your dream garden!

descriptionShort: Your classy escape to a fanciful life

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Wonderful news gardeners! There are exciting changes in store for you:
- An intriguing new story full of mystery, wonder, drama and romance
- A new line-up of exciting characters
- The events behind the mysterious mansion and garden will begin to unveil
- New elements and mechanics
- Various usability & performance improvements

title: Merge Gardens

creator: Futureplay
descriptionHtml:
Enter a mysterious garden to unlock its secrets, and uncover a story rooted deep in the past.
When Daisy inherits her missing uncle's old estate — one that she didn't even know he had owned — her only mission is to get the old place in good enough shape to sell it. But as she quickly finds out, there are truly mysterious things going on with this mansion and its surrounding garden.

Relax with this unique mix of Merge and Match-3 Puzzles, let your creativity shine by fixing up the old garden, and meet exciting new characters as you progress through the story that will take you through the ages!

RESTORE AND DISCOVER
- Start your restoration by working on a small plot at the mansion’s gates.
- Clear Evergrowth to unlock and reveal secrets inside the new areas.
- Collect rare creatures to live in your garden.

MERGE
- Merge three of a kind to evolve them into superior items.
- Discover hundreds of wonderful items and creatures.
- Challenge your mind by completing quests beyond your mansion’s garden.

SOLVE PUZZLES
- Test your solving puzzle skills by completing hundreds of Match 3 puzzle levels.
- Pop and blast 3D blocks for irresistible combos.
- Earn rewards for your garden at each level.

Myrtlegrove Estate's garden is full of human-shaped topiary statues and peculiar plants with roots that seem to cover the entire land. What in the world has Daisy actually inherited? It’s now up to you and Daisy to renovate the estate while dealing with the strange circumstances that affected her forgotten ancestors and forced her mother to break all ties with the family. It’s time to find your Green Thumbs.

If you have comments, ideas or suggestions, we’d love to receive them at mergegardens@futureplaygames.com

- Test your solving puzzle skills by completing hundreds of Match 3 puzzle levels.
- Pop and blast 3D blocks for irresistible combos.
- Earn rewards for your garden at each level.

Myrtlegrove Estate's garden is full of human-shaped topiary statues and peculiar plants with roots that seem to cover the entire land. What in the world has Daisy actually inherited? It’s now up to you and Daisy to renovate the estate while dealing with the strange circumstances that affected her forgotten ancestors and forced her mother to break all ties with the family. It’s time to find your Green Thumbs.

If you have comments, ideas or suggestions, we’d love to receive them at mergegardens@futureplaygames.com

title: Merge Gardens

creator: Futureplay
descriptionHtml:
Enter a mysterious garden to unlock its secrets, and uncover a story rooted deep in the past.
When Daisy inherits her missing uncle's old estate — one that she didn't even know he had owned — her only mission is to get the old place in good enough shape to sell it. But as she quickly finds out, there are truly mysterious things going on with this mansion and its surrounding garden.

Relax with this unique mix of Merge and Match-3 Puzzles, let your creativity shine by fixing up the old garden, and meet exciting new characters as you progress through the story that will take you through the ages!

RESTORE AND DISCOVER
- Start your restoration by working on a small plot at the mansion’s gates.
- Clear Evergrowth to unlock and reveal secrets inside the new areas.
- Collect rare creatures to live in your garden.

MERGE
- Merge three of a kind to evolve them into superior items.
- Discover hundreds of wonderful items and creatures.
- Challenge your mind by completing quests beyond your mansion’s garden.

SOLVE PUZZLES
- Test your solving puzzle skills by completing hundreds of Match 3 puzzle levels.
- Pop and blast 3D blocks for irresistible combos.
- Earn rewards for your garden at each level.

Myrtlegrove Estate's garden is full of human-shaped topiary statues and peculiar plants with roots that seem to cover the entire land. What in the world has Daisy actually inherited? It’s now up to you and Daisy to renovate the estate while dealing with the strange circumstances that affected her forgotten ancestors and forced her mother to break all ties with the family. It’s time to find your Green Thumbs.

When Daisy inherits her missing uncle's old estate — one that she didn't even know he had owned — her only mission is to get the old place in good enough shape to sell it. But as she quickly finds out, there are truly mysterious things going on with this mansion and its surrounding garden.

Relax with this unique mix of Merge and Match-3 Puzzles, let your creativity shine by fixing up the old garden, and meet exciting new characters as you progress through the story that will take you through the ages!

RESTORE AND DISCOVER
- Start your restoration by working on a small plot at the mansion’s gates.
- Clear Evergrowth to unlock and reveal secrets inside the new areas.
- Collect rare creatures to live in your garden.

MERGE
- Merge three of a kind to evolve them into superior items.
- Discover hundreds of wonderful items and creatures.
- Challenge your mind by completing quests beyond your mansion’s garden.

SOLVE PUZZLES
- Test your solving puzzle skills by completing hundreds of Match 3 puzzle levels.
- Pop and blast 3D blocks for irresistible combos.
- Earn rewards for your garden at each level.

Myrtlegrove Estate's garden is full of human-shaped topiary statues and peculiar plants with roots that seem to cover the entire land. What in the world has Daisy actually inherited? It’s now up to you and Daisy to renovate the estate while dealing with the strange circumstances that affected her forgotten ancestors and forced her mother to break all ties with the family. It’s time to find your Green Thumbs.

If you have comments, ideas or suggestions, we’d love to receive them at mergegardens@futureplaygames.com

When Daisy inherits her missing uncle's old estate — one that she didn't even know he had owned — her only mission is to get the old place in good enough shape to sell it. But as she quickly finds out, there are truly mysterious things going on with this mansion and its surrounding garden.

Relax with this unique mix of Merge and Match-3 Puzzles, let your creativity shine by fixing up the old garden, and meet exciting new characters as you progress through the story that will take you through the ages!

RESTORE AND DISCOVER
- Start your restoration by working on a small plot at the mansion’s gates.
- Clear Evergrowth to unlock and reveal secrets inside the new areas.
- Collect rare creatures to live in your garden.

MERGE
- Merge three of a kind to evolve them into superior items.
- Discover hundreds of wonderful items and creatures.
- Challenge your mind by completing quests beyond your mansion’s garden.

SOLVE PUZZLES
- Test your solving puzzle skills by completing hundreds of Match 3 puzzle levels.
- Pop and blast 3D blocks for irresistible combos.
- Earn rewards for your garden at each level.

Myrtlegrove Estate's garden is full of human-shaped topiary statues and peculiar plants with roots that seem to cover the entire land. What in the world has Daisy actually inherited? It’s now up to you and Daisy to renovate the estate while dealing with the strange circumstances that affected her forgotten ancestors and forced her mother to break all ties with the family. It’s time to find your Green Thumbs.

If you have comments, ideas or suggestions, we’d love to receive them at mergegardens@futureplaygames.com

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
WINTER HOLIDAY SEASON
It's the most wonderful time of the year! Get cozy, grab a hot cocoa and prepare yourself for FOUR WEEKS of winter fun!

IMPROVED UI
The new user interface is more streamlined and easier on the eye!
- Find the new Menu button at the top right corner of your garden. Tap it to open the wider menu view, which includes all the buttons you looking for!
- Find Event icons at the top part of the screen and exciting offers on the right-hand side of the screen

It’s time to find your Green Thumbs.

If you have comments, ideas or suggestions, we’d love to receive them at mergegardens@futureplaygames.com

title:

1.36.0

creator: Futureplay
descriptionHtml:
Enter a mysterious garden to unlock its secrets, and uncover a story rooted deep in the past.
When Daisy inherits her missing uncle's old estate — one that she didn't even know he had owned — her only mission is to get the old place in good enough shape to sell it. But as she quickly finds out, there are truly mysterious things going on with this mansion and its surrounding garden.

Relax with this unique mix of Merge and Match-3 Puzzles, let your creativity shine by fixing up the old garden, and meet exciting new characters as you progress through the story that will take you through the ages!

RESTORE AND DISCOVER
- Start your restoration by working on a small plot at the mansion’s gates.
- Clear Evergrowth to unlock and reveal secrets inside the new areas.
- Collect rare creatures to live in your garden.

MERGE
- Merge three of a kind to evolve them into superior items.
- Discover hundreds of wonderful items and creatures.
- Challenge your mind by completing quests beyond your mansion’s garden.

SOLVE PUZZLES
- Test your solving puzzle skills by completing hundreds of Match 3 puzzle levels.
- Pop and blast 3D blocks for irresistible combos.
- Earn rewards for your garden at each level.

It’s now up to you and Daisy to renovate the estate while dealing with the strange circumstances that affected her forgotten ancestors and forced her mother to break all ties with the family. It’s time to find your Green Thumbs.
